argument.name: Extension
argument.description: The filename extension that would be used for the table's index file.

argument.name: Table_Extension
argument.description: The three character file type extension associated with any Alpha Anywhere table.

page.description: Returns the Index file extension that would be associated with the passed in Table extension.
page.discussion: The TABLE.GET_INDEX_EXTENSION() method returns the extension of the associated index file for a particular Alpha Anywhere object type.
